name: BOOK OF PENG
description:
Within its pages, readers are transported to a world where Peng, a courageous and spirited penguin, embarks on incredible escapades that defy the ordinary. From traversing treacherous icy landscapes to soaring through the skies on the wings of eagles, each story within the “Book of Peng” is a testament to the boundless possibilities of adventure.
